mechanism.name: CyclinDynamic
mechanism.delta: JSBinaryExpression - JSBinaryExpression * X_a * C / (JSNumericLiteral + C) - JSNumericLiteral * C

mechanism.name: CdK2Dynamic
mechanism.delta: C / (JSNumericLiteral + C) * JSBinaryExpression * (1 - M_a) / (JSNumericLiteral + 1 - M_a) - JSBinaryExpression * M_a / (JSNumericLiteral + M_a)

mechanism.name: ProteaseDynamic
mechanism.delta: M_a * JSBinaryExpression * (1 - X_a) / (JSNumericLiteral + 1 - X_a) - JSBinaryExpression * X_a / (JSNumericLiteral + X_a)
